column1: This list of works by Álvaro Siza Vieira categorizes the Pritzker Prize winning architect's work.
1958-1963: Boa Nova restaurant in Leça da Palmeira
1985: Campo di Marte Social Housing Project
1986-1993: Faculty of Architecture of the University of Porto
1988: Rebuilding plans of the Chiado neighbourhood after a fire
1995: Revigrés exhibition and sales hall at Águeda
1995: Library of the University of Aveiro
1998-2005: General University Hospital of Ciudad Real
2006: Home and Atelier of Armanda Passos
2007-2010: Mimesis Museum in Paju Book City
2011: Bizkaia Aretoa main hall of the University of the Basque Country
2011-2012: "Alvaro Siza. Viagem sem Programa" Art work collection of his sketches and drawings. Museum Fondazione Querini Stampalia
2012: "Il Giardino delle Vergini" Pavilion Giardini della Biennale
2014: Office building for the Shihlien Chemical Industrial Jiangsu Co
2015: Auditorium Theatre of Llinars del Valles
2020: Huamao Museum of Art Education Yinzhou
